title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When trying to cancel adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, the cancellation has no effect and the breakpoint is still added.
OB: After clicking the J! button to add an exception breakpoint and then clicking cancel in the progress dialog, the breakpoint is still added to the breakpoints pane.
EB: After clicking cancel in the progress dialog, the exception breakpoint should not be added to the breakpoints pane.
SR:
1) Open the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 
2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 
3) In the progress dialog, click cancel to cancel adding the exception breakpoint. 
4) Verify that the exception breakpoint is not added to the breakpoints pane.
